attributes.action: TJ'S National fitness day- decrease obesity.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to do it because, maybe people theses days are obese and then that gets the best of there mind set and this can cause depression people to self harm because they are ashamed of there weight, and when you do exercise you get a feeling called dopamine witch makes you happy and that's good for your brain and mindset and also you'll feel more confident about yourself.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to make a National fitness day so people have to do some sort of physical fitness to keep in shape to decrease obesity here's an example- people have to go for a walk for 30-60 minutes if they are able too or do some sort of activity that they enjoy for 30-60 minutes.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for designating specific days for actions. You might like to know there is already a National Fitness Day:

https://www.nationalfitnessday.com/
